meanings.definition: Made of or having the color of gold.
meanings.sent1: The aureate necklace shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: She wore an aureate dress to the elegant party.
meanings.sent3: The aureate curtains made the room look like a royal palace.
meanings.sent4: His aureate words painted a picture of wealth and luxury.
meanings.sent5: The aureate sunset painted the sky in shades of gold.

meanings.definition: Highly ornamented or elaborate in style.
meanings.sent1: The aureate frame around the painting added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent2: The ballroom was decorated with aureate chandeliers and drapes.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so aureate with frosting that it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her aureate handwriting on the invitation impressed all the guests.
meanings.sent5: The aureate crown sparkled with intricate designs and jewels.
